mean_en: to provide something good as a balance against something bad or undesirable; to make up
word_etyma: com共同 + pens称银子（花费） + ate动词后缀 → compensate 补偿，赔偿
short_phrase: compensate for sth. by buying flowers
sentence: He compensated his ex-wife with lots of money after the divorce.
sentence_trans: 离婚后他补偿了他前妻很多钱。
